s:service.name: BridgeService
s:service.s:description: Bridge Service for the mgt of bridge devices

s:method.name: RegisterDevice
s:method.description: Assigns a place to the device with the specified id provided the device is online.

s:return.name: alreadyAddedAtPlace
s:return.description: Whether or not the bridge device has already been added the requested place. If true, callers may assume that no base:Added event will be issued for the device. False or unspecified (previous behavior) implies that the client should expect a base:Added event.

s:method.name: RemoveDevice
s:method.description: Removes the device with the specified id.

s:parameter.name: accountId
s:parameter.description: The account id of the device

s:parameter.name: placeId
s:parameter.description: The place id of the device
